Module org.screen_time_tracker.screen_time_tracker
Package org.screen_time_tracker.screen_time_tracker.Model

Class SQLiteUserDAO

java.lang.Object
org.screen_time_tracker.screen_time_tracker.Model.SQLiteUserDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUsersDetails
public class SQLiteUserDAO extends Object implements IUsersDetails
Manages Timers session activities, including enabling notifications and setting timers for how long a user should be active on a screen .
